seo.title: Web Designer & Developer from Belgium
seo.description: Empower your business with state-of-the-art digital solutions e.g. website with a focus on your needs: web design, web development and more.
seo.ogDescription: Empower your business with state-of-the-art digital solutions e.g. website with a focus on your needs: web design, web development and more.

localBusiness.name: Webdevamin
localBusiness.description: Affordable web designer specializing in creating business websites, including maintenance and SEO optimization.

service.description: Professional and affordable business websites including maintenance, hosting, and SEO.

mainEntity.name: What does it cost to have a business website made?

acceptedAnswer.text: With me, you pay only €79 per month for a professional business website. For more complex projects with extensive functionalities, the costs are higher. The subscription includes valuable benefits such as free domain name, hosting, maintenance, and personal support. Everything you need for a worry-free online presence.

mainEntity.name: How long does it take to create a website?

acceptedAnswer.text: The time needed to create a website depends on the complexity and specific requirements. With me, you can expect a turnaround time of about 5 days for a standard business website. For more complex projects, this may take longer, but I will always keep you informed of the progress.

mainEntity.name: How much are the setup costs?

acceptedAnswer.text: There are no setup costs! Only the subscription counts.

mainEntity.name: Can I add extra pages later?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, you can always have extra pages or sections added to your website. This can be done easily by submitting a request. Depending on the complexity and the number of pages, a small one-time surcharge will be calculated on top of your subscription.

mainEntity.name: Can I manage my website myself?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, I take full responsibility for managing your website. This has significant advantages: I can guarantee optimal maintenance and ensure everything continues to function perfectly. Experience shows that self-management often leads to unnecessary time loss and technical challenges when expanding or modifying the website. You don't need to worry about this - you can always request adjustments or additions from me. The costs for this are very affordable, and I am happy to assist you with any desired changes. I ensure that you can focus your time and energy on your business, while I take care of the technical side of your website.

mainEntity.name: Is hosting and domain name included?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, both hosting and the domain name are included with every subscription. You don't have to worry about extra costs or administrative hassle. I ensure everything is properly arranged so you can concentrate on your business.

At Webdevamin, customer satisfaction is paramount. If you are not satisfied within 30 days after the launch of your website, you can request a full refund. This gives you the opportunity to try the subscription risk-free.

blocks.title: Freelance Software Developer
blocks.subtitle: Webdevamin
blocks.text: Empower your business with state-of-the-art digital solutions, such as websites, web applications, and digital marketing, with a focus on your specific needs, including web design, web development, and more.
blocks.extra: Also custom-made web applications such as:

img.alt: An affordable web designer programming to finish a professional website.

blocks.title: Services & tech
blocks.subtitle: Web Designer | Web Developer | SEO
blocks.text: As a professional freelancer specialized in professional web design, SEO, and web development, I create state-of-the-art digital solutions with a focus on your needs. Examples are: regular business websites, applications for administrative purposes (e.g. selecting personnel for certain tasks), webshops, food delivery web applications, CRMs, and more. In other words: anything that needs to appear on the screen to increase your business' efficiency and/or attract more users, ultimately generating more revenue.

img.alt: Computer with code for developing a business website in a dark environment.

blocks.title: My Services
blocks.subtitle: What I offer
blocks.text:
Custom digital solutions that perfectly match your business needs. From elegant designs to advanced development. Whether you're looking for a freelance web designer, an affordable web designer, or an experienced software developer, you've come to the right place.

In short: digital solutions that save time and costs and increase your revenue.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: Beautiful, modern, and user-friendly website designs that leave a lasting impression on your visitors and perfectly represent your brand.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Custom web solutions built with the latest technologies to ensure your website is fast, secure, and scalable.

services.title: SEO Optimization
services.description: Improve your visibility in search engines and attract more organic traffic with comprehensive SEO strategies.

services.title: Graphic Design
services.description: Striking visual and branding elements that enhance your website's appeal and strengthen your brand identity.

services.title: E-commerce
services.description: Full-fledged webshops that make selling your products online easy, secure, and profitable.

services.title: Automation Systems
services.description: Custom automation solutions to streamline your business processes, save time, and reduce operational costs.

blocks.title: Projects
blocks.text: Get inspired by completed projects: from sleek business websites to advanced web applications. With an eye for optimal speed and SEO, ensuring your online success.

blocks.title: Pricing Subscription
blocks.subtitle: Affordable web designer & developer
blocks.text:
Discover my transparent and simple pricing strategy for web development. Starting from just €79 per month, you get an SEO optimized, professional business website with numerous benefits, without hidden costs. The price varies slightly depending on the complexity and scope of your specific project.

In addition to a professional business website, you receive lifelong free hosting, domain name, maintenance, updates, and more - everything to save you time and costs! I handle all administrative tasks, so you can fully focus on growing your business.

Check out this example website, developed for a construction company in Bruges for €79 per month, to get an impression of my work.

Want to know the prices I charge my existing clients? View my realized digital solutions for concrete examples and corresponding prices.

items.title: Professional, business website
items.details: Naturally, you get a website with a professional and business-like appearance that is essential for your company image. Your website standardly includes: a navigation menu with links, introduction, footer with social media links and company details, contact and/or quote form, about us section, services overview, project gallery, and FAQ (frequently asked questions) section. Extra functionality such as a reservation system is possible for a small additional fee. Of course, you can also choose which sections you want on your website.

items.title: Excellent display on all devices
items.details: Your website will look great on all devices such as smartphones, tablets, and computers.

items.title: Lifelong FREE hosting
items.details: You never have to pay for hosting. I handle everything for you. Hosting: putting your website online.

items.title: Lifelong FREE domain name
items.details: You never have to pay for a domain name. I handle everything for you. Domain name: your website address (e.g., www.yourcompany.com)

items.title: Lifelong FREE maintenance and updates
items.details: I always ensure your website is and remains up-to-date so it always functions excellently. You don't have to worry about updates or maintenance.

items.title: Excellent SEO on your website, FREE
items.details: I ensure your website ranks well in Google so you get more visitors. SEO: search engine optimization. This is important for your website to be found in Google and other search engines.

items.title: FREE logos
items.details: You read that right! With a subscription, you receive a free logo from my collection, fully tailored to your wishes. And you can have as many as you want.

items.title: Administration & invoices handled by me
items.details: I handle all administration and invoicing for you, such as the website, hosting, and domain name. So you don't have to worry about invoices for website maintenance, domain names, etc. You can fully focus on your core activities, while I take care of everything related to the website.

items.title: 24/7 support
items.details: Do you have questions or comments? You can always contact me. I'm happy to help you further at no cost.

items.title: No setup costs!
items.details: Yup, you read that right! No setup costs whatsoever. You only pay for the subscription itself.

items.title: Not satisfied? 30-day money back
items.details: Not satisfied? No problem, you get your money back within 30 days.

blocks.title: Blogs
blocks.text: Discover insights and practical tips on IT, development, web design, and freelancing. Stay updated on trends and get inspiration to grow your projects and boost your career.

blocks.title: Testimonials
blocks.subtitle: customer reviews
blocks.text: Extremely satisfied clients from all over the world. Translating wishes into custom digital solutions. For more reviews, check my Google My Business profile.

testimonials.name: Alexi
testimonials.review: Very professional, friendly, good prices, definitely recommended.

testimonials.name: Natan Hongenaert
testimonials.review: Transparent and flexible in his way of working. He thinks along to set up a solution that works in the long term.

testimonials.name: Robert Chen
testimonials.review: Excellent work. Thinks along and searches for a solution. Very good price and quality work delivered. Extremely satisfied. Thanks Amin.

testimonials.name: Filip
testimonials.review: Beautiful, strong, and affordable website developed for our organization. If you are looking for a reliable web designer from Bruges, you know where to go.

blocks.title: Frequently Asked Questions
blocks.subtitle: Questions & Answers
blocks.text: Below is a list of frequently asked questions about web development and business websites. If you have another question, don't hesitate to contact me.

blocks.title: Our Location
blocks.subtitle: Based in Bruges
blocks.text:
Webdevamin is located in the historic heart of Bruges, a city that combines creativity and innovation with centuries-old charm. From this inspiring environment, I develop professional websites and web applications for entrepreneurs throughout Belgium and beyond.

Whether you're looking for a web designer in Bruges or a freelance web developer who brings your digital vision to life - I'm ready to realize your project. Feel free to contact me for a personal conversation or a non-binding quote!

blocks.title: Ready to start?
blocks.text: Save time and costs while attracting more customers and increasing your long-term profit with a professional business website! Contact us today to discuss your project without obligation.

blocks.title: Contact
blocks.text: Do you have questions or are you interested in a business website or a custom web application to grow your business? Contact us today!
